title: Can't connect to the game
body:
After champion select i got in to the loading screen and it sais that i can't connect because my internet is not working . (My internet was working fine, was watching livestreams on my tablet) . i kept reconnecting until the screen went black and my mouse had the loading icon. Still can't reconnect to the game.
EDIT: game ended at 17 mins as a loss, nobody remake the game and i got a leave buster. WTF?

replies.body: Getting stuck at a black screen and receiving connection errors can be due to your network having problems establishing a connection to the game server.  If you are still experiencing this, please check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot further.

I am having the same trouble on my Mac client, i can easily play custome game without any problems but whenever i try to enter a game with others the game crashes at the loading screen even if i am 100% loaded.
I am AFK in two games so far, please help
Thanks

Im left on the loading section, all I get is "Logging on..." and then nothing happens. :( I got randomly a weird information yeasterday that said something about server problem, I couldnt see what my cousin was playing. So I thought it was a bug, I tried to login again, and then I just.... couldnt. ;c
The issue is from yeasterday's evening till today's monday.... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Yeah, feelsbadman, it said something about server error for me to but after i relaunched several times the screen just went black. The worst part is that i have 20 mins leave buster.

Oh man, I feel so sorry for you. :c

Well, all I can say is I can be waiting over 20+ mins staring on "Logging on..." without even error appearing, lol.
Before there was some huge issue on EUNE where alot of players couldnt login, altho there was some Error about connection timeout appearing, now the client tries constantly to login even tho it just... cant.
Like I dont understand what is this, and I highly hope they will fix it... because last time, as the issue I typed about right there ^ , I had to wait three days to be able to succesfully login... ugh.
